title: Fix the login bug
body: The user login is not working properly in the mobile app. This needs to be fixed urgently.

title: Implement dark mode
body: Add dark mode theme support to improve user experience during night time usage.

title: Update documentation
body: The API documentation is outdated and needs to be refreshed with latest changes.

title: Performance optimization
body: The application is running slow on older devices. We need to optimize the code.

title: Unit test coverage
body: Increase unit test coverage to at least 80% for better code quality assurance.
